snippet: A lack of year round consistency is likely to ensure that three-times grand slam champion Stan Wawrinka does not topple Britain's Andy Murray from the top of the rankings, the Swiss has said....
lead_paragraph: A lack of year round consistency is likely to ensure that three-times grand slam champion Stan Wawrinka does not topple Britain's Andy Murray from the top of the rankings, the Swiss has said.

headline.print_headline: World Number One Might Be a Step Too Far, Says Wawrinka
headline.main: World Number One Might Be a Step Too Far, Says Wawrinka
